settings.main_paragraph:
We do not ship physical paper copies of our plans.
All of our products are shipped via email in a digital format, either PDF or CAD. You will receive your plans digitally, within 1-2 business days. If the foundation option you selected needs to be developed, then it can take up to 5 business days to deliver the plans. If you have requested modifications, we will send you a quote within 5-10 business days.
